agents.name: OutageScraperAgent
agents.description: Fetches recent BESCOM power cut events in Bengaluru using Gemini + GoogleSearch grounding; outputs JSON with location, start_time, end_time, and reason.

outage_summary.prompt:
Use the GoogleSearch tool to find **official BESCOM power cut notices** for Bengaluru issued in the **last 7 days**. For each event, output a JSON object with exactly these fields:
  • location (area affected)
  • start_time (ISO-8601 start)
  • end_time (ISO-8601 end or null)
  • reason (official explanation)
Return a single JSON array—no extra text or commentary.
